name: Free Drive: Multiplayer Car Driving Simulation
name_original: Free Drive: Multiplayer Car Driving Simulation
description:
Multiplayer Car Simulation Game.

Drive Without Any Limits

Start playing with your friends in a big map.

Free Drive is a multiplayer car driving game, you can choose between 21 current cars and start playing with your friends in two different maps.

New Cars and Maps will be added soon.
--- Stay Tuned For Updates ---

Drive as fast as you can. Crash your car into the walls. Jump through the fire rings.

You can also play offline and single player.

There is no score or level. Unlimited car driving. All the cars are open from the beginning.

=== FREE DRIVE ===

- Realistic Graphics:
A good graphics makes you feel that you are actually in there.

- Large Map:
Drive Ground is a big map with lots of toys for cars. Jumping Bridges, bridges, 360° Circles, Fire Rings, ...
Hills, Mountains and Los Angeles

- Player Avatar
In FREE DRIVE players have specific avatar and level that other players can see in the game.

- Car Customization
You can change the color of the cars and customize it the way you like.

- Upgrade Cars
Drive and collect XP and Upgrade Your Car.

- Race
Start a Race in Mountains or Los Angeles and start racing with your friends.

- Real Car Physics:
Using rigid bodies and physics engines, FREE DRIVE will give you an amazing experience of car physics and makes the game more enjoyable.
